This is truly an awesome torrent.  I downloaded it about 6 months ago and have been steadily working my way through - fantastic stuff.  My recommendations are Firestarter, Thinner and the Running Man.
Please note:  If you listen to the Running man SKIP the introduction to the Bachman books part at the beginning as it contains a spoiler for the ending of The Running Man.  Otherwise you will here the ending before you even hear the first word of the book.
And it's a very different ending to the film if you're wondering.  In fact the two stories are nothing alike at all.

thank you soooo much for this upload! it has every book i was looking for and more (including rage which isn't even published anymore) plus alternate versions. only took me 2 days to download. everything is extremely organized. thank you sooo much! will seed.
